EmailTemplate.description: Individual FPR Reviewer reviewed, others are still pending Email
EmailTemplate.name: Individual FPR Reviewer reviewed
EmailTemplate.subject: FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Has Been Reviewed by {!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} has been reviewed by {!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c}. Please note, the FPR process has not completed and other reviews are still pending.
Contact the FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, If you have questions or need support.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Thank you, FPR System
